commands.name: az pipelines variable-group create
commands.syntax:
az pipelines variable-group create --name
                                   --variables
                                   [--authorize {false, true}]
                                   [--description]
                                   [--detect {false, true}]
                                   [--org]
                                   [--project]

commands.name: az pipelines variable-group list
commands.syntax:
az pipelines variable-group list [--action {manage, none, use}]
                                 [--continuation-token]
                                 [--detect {false, true}]
                                 [--group-name]
                                 [--org]
                                 [--project]
                                 [--query-order {Asc, Desc}]
                                 [--top]

commands.name: az pipelines variable-group update
commands.syntax:
az pipelines variable-group update --group-id
                                   [--authorize {false, true}]
                                   [--description]
                                   [--detect {false, true}]
                                   [--name]
                                   [--org]
                                   [--project]
